## SessionStorage interface

Provides an interface to store and retrieve data across requests.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SessionStorage<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [clear()](./kibana-plugin-core-server.sessionstorage.clear.md) | Clears current session. |
|  [get()](./kibana-plugin-core-server.sessionstorage.get.md) | Retrieves session value from the session storage. |
|  [set(sessionValue)](./kibana-plugin-core-server.sessionstorage.set.md) | Puts current session value into the session storage. |
